original_text: And when they were come to the land of Zuph, Saul said to his servant that was with him, Come, and let us return; lest my father leave caring for the asses, and take thought for us.
korean_text: 그들이 숩 땅에 이른 때에 사울이 함께 가던 사환에게 이르되 돌아가자 내 아버지께서 암나귀 생각은 고사하고 우리를 위하여 걱정하실까 두려워하노라 하니

sentences.original_text: And when they were come to the land of Zuph
Saul said to his servant that was with him
sentences.korean_translation: 사울이 자기와 함께 있던 종에게 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: lest my father leave caring for the asses
sentences.korean_translation: 내 아버지가 나귀들을 돌보는 것을 그만두고
